trim-repeated

Trim a consecutively repeated substring: foo--bar---baz → foo-bar-baz

Install

$ npm install --save trim-repeated

Usage

var trimRepeated = require('trim-repeated');

trimRepeated('foo--bar---baz', '-');
//=> 'foo-bar-baz'

trimRepeated('foo@#@#baz', '@#');
//=> 'foo@#baz'

trimRepeated(input, target)

input

Required
Type: string

target

Required
Type: string

Substring to trim.

Related

  • condense-whitespace - Remove leading, trailing and repeated whitespace from a string
